text: Grünwinkel is a borough in the southwest of Karlsruhe, Baden-Württemberg, in the southwest of Germany. == History == There are archeological traces of a brickyard from the 1st century. Written information dates from the 15th century, when the name was Kreenwinkel, which can be read as crow corner. Today's name means green corner.
